ch.bfh.bti7301.hs2013.gravis.core.util

Class GravisColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.bti7301.hs2013.gravis.core.util.GravisColor

  • public abstract class GravisColor
extends java.lang.Object
    The colours of GRAVIS.

    Some colours in a tool class though serving with static elements only.

    The class is built like Color.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    Color
